title: OAU Chatbot
description: Intelligent chatbot system deployed for Obafemi Awolowo University using LLMs and LangChain for student assistance and university information queries.

title: NGX Chatbot
description: Advanced conversational AI chatbot built with Large Language Models and LangChain for enhanced user interaction and intelligent responses.

title: WeApply Platform
description: AI-powered application platform that generates personalized resumes, cover letters, and interview questions using LLMs and LangChain.

title: Dementia Tester
description: AI-powered diagnostic assessment tool for dementia testing using Large Language Models and advanced ML algorithms for medical analysis.

title: Article Hub
description: Intelligent chat interface for querying and interacting with a comprehensive database of articles using LLMs and LangChain for contextual responses.

title: Library Backend System
description: Comprehensive library management backend with advanced search, cataloging, and user management features built with FastAPI.

title: Word Formatter Tool
description: Intelligent document formatting and processing tool using LLMs and LangChain for automated text optimization and layout enhancement.

title: Analysis Generator API
description: Automated analysis generation system using Large Language Models to provide intelligent insights and comprehensive reports from data inputs.
